121113.content:
A hugely round and obese Timmy Turner lay in his bed, clad only in his underwear (all other clothes he had grown out of). With one hand, he rubbed his stuffed belly, and with the other, he lazily reached to the side for more cake. To his dismay, he was out of cake! Despite being so full, Timmy's belly growled for more. Ever since he had wished all the food in the world to be desserts, he had pushed his appetite and gotten hungrier and greedier with each passing day! He didn't mind that he had gotten so fat, in fact, he kind of liked it!

With a few great heaves, Timmy rolled out of bed. From the minimum effort it took to get out of bed, he was already breathing heavily and sweating. Thankfully, he had through ahead enough to wish that no matter how big anyone got, he'd still be able to make wishes and the Earth would never plummet into the sun (a ridiculous thought, but he figured it'd be better to play it safe than sorry).

"Cosmo? Wanda?" Timmy called out, clutching at the sides of his belly hungrily. No response. Timmy waddled over to the fishbowl to find it empty. Cosmo and Wanda had been spending more and more time alone with each other since growing fat. Timmy could tell there was something about gorging on desserts together that they REALLY enjoyed.

Accepting that he might not find his fairies, Timmy instead began to search the house. Maybe there was something he could do to keep himself well fed?

1213321.content:
“Hey Wanda?” Timmy said a bit apprehensively. His fairy god parents were just floating around, not really doing anything while he finished up his homework.

“Yeah, sport?”

“Think you could check Da Rulez for me? There’s this wish I’ve been wanting to make. It’s probably impossible, but I figured I might as well check.”

Wanda smiled appreciatively. “Nice to see you thinking ahead for a change.” Her wand lit and the great book appeared before her.

“Yeah,” agreed Cosmo. “Usually you make wishes that seem like a good idea at the time, but then spiral out of control about the time Da Rulez jump in to stop things before anything too fun happens. Boy, this’ll sure be an interesting change of pace.”

Wanda blinked, taken aback by her husband’s surprisingly insightful observation. “Uh, okay. So what wish were you thinking about, sport?”

Timmy rubbed his arm and averted his gaze. “It’s a little embarrassing.”

“Don’t be shy, Timmy,” assured Cosmo. “We’re you’re fairy god parents, here to make your wildest wishes come true.” Wanda cleared her throat and gestured to her book. “You know, within reason.”

“Okay, fine.” Timmy heaved a sigh, mustered his courage, and decided to just rip off this bandage. “I know Da Rulez says I can’t do anything to mess with true love and all that but,” he gulped, “what about sex?” Timmy flinched, bracing himself one of Wanda’s patented lectures or even Cosmo mocking him. But no such thing happened. Instead, the pink haired fairy was flipping through the pages like she hadn’t heard something outrageous.

“Hmm. You’re right that you can’t wish someone to fall in love with you, but lust is a whole other matter.”

“It… is?” Timmy could hardly believe what he was hearing.

“Sure is,” confirmed Cosmo. “See, unlike you humans, us fairies have a much more relaxed attitude about sex. Love is still sacred, but everyone is free to lust to their heart’s desire.”

“Pretty much,” agreed Wanda as she pointed at the book. “It even says as much right here right after the stipulations about love.”

Timmy blinked, still processing that this was actually happening. But even with his assurances, there was still a voice in the back of his head warning him that this was all too good to be true. Even if he could just wish everything back to normal in the end, this seemed too major to go into half-cocked. “Does it say anything else? Like, are there any kind of warnings or weird restrictions?”

“Hmm. Apparently how you phrase things can lead to some unexpected consequences, but that’s typical of all wishes. Oh, and it also says that lust has been known to lead to love in some cases, depending on how well you perform.”

“Really!?” Timmy exclaimed.

“Sure thing. Sex creates a euphoric state that leaves most humans susceptible to suggestion. So if you treat your wished love partner well, eventually they might develop real affection for you. Hmm. That’s a pretty big loop hole for the hole love rule, now that I think about it.”

“So, like, hypothetically speaking, if I were to wish that Trixie was my girlfriend and was in lust with me…?” He trailed off.

Wanda flipped through a few more pages. “Seems fine to me.”

“Oh. Oh-oh-oh!” Cosmo raised his hand. “Me. Pick me!”

“Uh, Cosmo,” acknowledged Timmy.

“Might want to add that everyone accepts your relationship. You know, unless you want all her suitors to beat you up.”

“Wow, you’re on a roll today,” praised Wanda.

“I know, right. Hey, as a reward, you think we can do that one thing I like. You know, to celebrate Timmy losing his virginity?”

Wanda fluttered her eyelids. “I don’t see why not.” Then she turned back to Timmy. “Okay sport. Got your phrasing down?”

Timmy beamed ear-to-ear. “I sure hope so.” He cleared his throat. “I wish that Trixie was my girlfriend, that she really likes having sex with me, and that everyone accepts what we do as completely normal.”

The fairies held up their wands and the spell was cast.
1213321.title: Wish for Trixie

121351.content:
Once every few hundred years, Fairy Godparents are allowed a period of time in which they can take a break from their responsibilities and are allowed to act evil. Fortunately for our story, the time is right for a certain fairy godparent named Wanda, to take a break from having to deal with the antics of her half-witted husband Cosmo, and her troublemaking shortsighted godchild, Timmy Turner. In all of the time, Wanda had developed more than a few feelings of resentment towards Timmy for all the problems he had caused with his wishes, and today was the day that Wanda would get her revenge.


It was midnight in the town of Dimsdale, and in a fateful house, a ten-year old boy slept soundly alongside his pet goldfish. One of the two goldfish however was quite awake, and ready to carry out her mischief. With a POOF, Wanda appeared in her fairy form and threw the covers off of Timmy who continued to slumber away. With a wave of her wand, Wanda conjured up a fire hydrant with a hose attached and dressed herself in full fireman regalia. The fire hose snaked it's way into Timmy's mouth and with another wave of her wand the hydrant was open and a stream of water began to flood into the sleeping boy.

In a flash, Wanda had inflated Timmy into a massive water balloon that was now straining his bed. Timmy Turner looked like a massive sphere with a pink pajama pattern that now looked painted on. Timmy didn't even have arms or legs anymore!
121351.title: Every fairy must take a break

info.brief_description: A no limit fetish story of your favorite cartoon kids!
info.description:
Are you like me and sick of all these fetish stories here with dumb limits and nonsense rules like (No gays! oh and no sex! cause this is safe story made for jacking off, but lets pretend it not! Okay:3). Maybe your sick of finding a good looking story only to be hit on rules banning your favorite thing to whack off too?.

Well fear not this is the any goes stories! Number 1! In this one the focus is on those sweet sexy little animated kids; from tv to movies, to even comics. The only real limit is, no focus on adults, teen is bit on the edge but I rather not deal with them but if you really really want to. Go a head.

Now while it dose say anything goes. That really kind of little lie, as there are some rules in order to make this work. I will enforce them; so read them and follow them! You get three warnings before I just ban you.

1. Proof Read before you post! I am not so great at grammar and spelling my self but please look over your writing and make sure it has both decent spelling and grammar.

2. Proper Formatting. Simple Paragraphs people! it not that hard, I just want it to be easy to read is all.

3. Don't be a weenie. Don't go to story path that have fetishes you don't like just to derail it and make it more your style. Make your own.

4. Don't hold back! I don't care how sick or filthy it is. Even if I don't care for the fetish. Go on, make it happen!

5. Focus on the kids.
